member.name: M:Sony.PS4.SaveData.ResponseBase.ConvertReturnCodeToString(Sony.PS4.SaveData.FunctionTypes)
member.summary: Generate a string containing the Hex return code and if known the Return code name taken from the Core.ReturnCodes enum. As some of the enums share the same code the returned string will depend on the API function used that generated the return code;
member.param: The API that generated the return code.
member.returns: The constructed string with the Hex and return code name.
member.remarks: By default apiCalled will be FunctionType.invalid. This will return the first Core.ReturnCodes enum that matches the return code value so may produce an incorrect string.
